summary: This mod aims to remake the Drunken Huntsman so that it matches more the wild theme of a bosmeric shop/tavern. So anyone who loves archery can finally enjoy the Drunken Huntsman in a more immersive way. (edit: added better screenshots)
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b][color=#b4a7d6]MiniPantsu's Drunken Huntsman Overhaul[/color][/b]
[/size][size=2]This mod aims to remake the Drunken Huntsman so that it matches more the wild theme of a bosmeric shop/tavern. So anyone who loves archery can finally enjoy the Drunken Huntsman in a more immersive way.[/size]

This mod:
• Does NOT require any DLC's
• Is easy to install
• Doesn't use scripts (safe to uninstall)
• Is immersive

So yea. Basically I got bored with the old boring empty Drunken Huntsman which was one of my favourite places in Whiterun.. so I really wanted to do something with it. I mainly wanted to bring out the theme that this building should have had in the first place.. well.. here's the result of my hard work! Hope you'll enjoy my pimped out version of the Drunken Huntsman! ^^

[b][color=#6aa84f]Really huge thanks to zGRD for providing amazing screenshots of my mod! (I'm obviously pretty horrible at it xP)
*hug*[/color][/b]

Mods used for thumbnail:

Yes, I'm into indie.. don't judge c:

Peace!
author: MiniPantsu
